title: WATCH YOUR MESSAGES! *URGENT*
body:
Someone is stealing accounts on League of Legends, sending what seems to be a harmless poll vote through chats about League of Legends. A friend has lost his account "Mars Yeti" and had sent the message to me. I regrettably got caught for a moment, but managed to change my password in a matter of a few seconds and have had no issues since. Please watch your messages and don't click any links! Sorry for those that may have received a message from me. I noticed three people had been sent the same message. 

Stay safe and keep your accounts safe as well!

replies.body:
Definitely be wary of any links to websites you're not familiar with. Below are some helpful links in ensuring your account is secure:

[Summoner Safety Initiative](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664)

[Account Management](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect)

[Verify your Email Address](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751744)

Let me know if you have any other questions about account security!
